thread.title: After Jim Boeheim Complains About NCAA Tournament Snub, Syracuse Loses In Second Round Of NIT
thread.title_full: After Jim Boeheim Complains About NCAA Tournament Snub, Syracuse Loses In Second Round Of NIT

author: Emma Baccellieri
title: After Jim Boeheim Complains About NCAA Tournament Snub, Syracuse Loses In Second Round Of NIT

organizations.name: losses jim boeheim says selection committee paid too
losses jim boeheim says selection committee paid too much attention to syracuse
jim boeheim says selection committee paid too much attention to syracuse

text:
Go to permalink Photo Credit: Nick Lisi/ AP 
Here is Syracuse’s Jim Boeheim a week ago, after the team was (very reasonably) left out of the NCAA Tournament bracket: 
“We had three monster wins... Only thing [the committee] talked about was our bad losses. We went out played teams. I don’t know if everyone did that.” Jim Boeheim Says Selection Committee Paid Too Much Attention To Syracuse's Losses Jim Boeheim Says Selection Committee Paid Too Much Attention To Syracuse's Losses Jim Boeheim Says Selection Committee Paid Too… As holistic as the NCAA Tournament selection process is supposed to be, the committee members are… Read more Read more 
Here is Syracuse today, playing five-seed Ole Miss at home in the Carrier Dome during the second round of the NIT: 
So it goes.
